original_title: The Doors - Feast Of Friends: Encore
overview: A newly produced feature using footage shot for Feast Of Friends, Encore is a complimentary piece which provides a deeper look into the life of the band at this period as they tour, record, travel and even vacation together. The program avoids the typical selection of hits and makes use of The Doors' rare recordings to accompany this unreleased footage.
title: The Doors - Feast Of Friends: Encore
